official_title: A resolution honoring the American Culinary Federation and the National Restaurant Association for their contributions to American culinary art and for their support of the 1988 United States Culinary Team.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives honors the American Culinary Federation and the National Restaurant Association for their contributions to American culinary art and for their support of the 1988 United States Culinary Team.
